page.title: 11Recreation in Stirling
page.content: In Stirling there are lots of things you can do in your free time. There is the Stirling Leisure Centre where you can take part in football, table- tennis, netball, boxing, gymnastics & badminton. There are classes for yoga, ballet, tap-dancing, modern and jazz dancing. Scottish Country Dancing, Highland Dancing, aerobics in various halls. Our area has a Rugby Club, Boys Football Club, a Swimming Club and an Orienteering Club. In the Kings Park there is a lot of playing area and an eighteen hole golf course. At the swimming pool there are classes for all ages and on Thursday there is a club for disabled people. For BMX bicycle enthusiasts there is a track in the Cornton area which is very popular this year. There are four bowling clubs. Two snooker clubs have been opened recently.
